title: I have $100 to invest. How can I make $500 in the stock market in one week? - Quora

response.answer_text: I forex trading with 100 USD capital you can trade in 0.01–0.10 lot easily with leverage of 1:100 and forex is very liquid and volatile market and you can take 20pips of stoploss and 30 pips of target. with 2 to 3 trades per day with 65% accuracy you can make your capital 500 USD in one week.

Your only real chance is buying out of the money options. They actually have a chance at moving 5x in a week. Especially in this volatile market. Buying stocks outright would be almost impossible to have a 5x in a week
